summary: Tintin and Captain Haddock try to discover what is so desirable about their old and apparently worthless ship.
cast: Jean-Pierre Talbot|Georges Wilson|Georges Loriot|Milo|Charles Vanel|Marcel Bozzuffi|Max Elloy|Serge Marquand|Henri Soya|Michel Thomass|Darío Moreno|Demetrios Myra|Dimos Starenios|Gamonal|Guy Henry|Ulvi Uraz|Dora Stratou|Dimitris Myrat|Kamer Baba|Faik Coskun|Daniel Emilfork|Marcel Policard
title: Tintín y el misterio del Toisón de Oro
